languages.text: "Сгинувший еретик был одним из ближайших приспешников Кунрада Войгтвира. И он сообщил — прокричал сквозь боль — то, что я так давно стремилась узнать. Приметы маршрута к Салис Прайм, миру, куда я стремлюсь всем сердцем! Как бы ни пытались еретики Последнего восхода остановить нас — им это не удастся".

traits.locale_text: "Сгинувший еретик был одним из ближайших приспешников Кунрада Войгтвира. И он сообщил — прокричал сквозь боль — то, что я так давно стремилась узнать. Приметы маршрута к Салис Прайм, миру, куда я стремлюсь всем сердцем! Как бы ни пытались еретики Последнего восхода остановить нас — им это не удастся".

languages.text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."
languages.original_text: "Сгинувший еретик был одним из ближайших приспешников Кунрада Войгтвира. И он сообщил — прокричал сквозь боль — то, что я так давно стремилась узнать. Приметы маршрута к Салис Прайм, миру, куда я стремлюсь всем сердцем! Как бы ни пытались еретики Последнего восхода остановить нас — им это не удастся".

traits.locale_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

"The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

"The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

"The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

languages.text: «El hereje era uno de los esbirros de confianza de Kunrad Voigtvir. Y ha revelado entre gritos de dolor lo que llevaba tanto tiempo deseando oír: ¡las coordenadas de la ruta a Salis Prime, el mundo que atrae mis pasos! Los herejes del Amanecer Final han hecho lo posible por detenernos, pero han fracasado».
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: «El hereje era uno de los esbirros de confianza de Kunrad Voigtvir. Y ha revelado entre gritos de dolor lo que llevaba tanto tiempo deseando oír: ¡las coordenadas de la ruta a Salis Prime, el mundo que atrae mis pasos! Los herejes del Amanecer Final han hecho lo posible por detenernos, pero han fracasado».

languages.text: 「あの異端者はクンラッド・ボイトヴィルのもっとも親しい手下のひとりだった。奴は苦しみにのたうち回りながら、私がずっと前から求めていた情報を漏らした…私の心が求める惑星、サリス・プライムへの航路の目印を教えてくれたのだ！ 最後の夜明けの異端者どもは我々を阻止しようと躍起になったが、失敗した」
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: 「あの異端者はクンラッド・ボイトヴィルのもっとも親しい手下のひとりだった。奴は苦しみにのたうち回りながら、私がずっと前から求めていた情報を漏らした…私の心が求める惑星、サリス・プライムへの航路の目印を教えてくれたのだ！ 最後の夜明けの異端者どもは我々を阻止しようと躍起になったが、失敗した」

languages.text: “那个异端分子是昆拉德·维特威尔最亲密的党羽之一。他痛苦的呼号向我揭示了我长久以来一直想知道的事情——通往萨利斯主星的道路的标志，那个我朝思暮想的世界！终末黎明的异端分子尽其所能地想阻止我们，但他们失败了。”
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: “那个异端分子是昆拉德·维特威尔最亲密的党羽之一。他痛苦的呼号向我揭示了我长久以来一直想知道的事情——通往萨利斯主星的道路的标志，那个我朝思暮想的世界！终末黎明的异端分子尽其所能地想阻止我们，但他们失败了。”

languages.text: « Cet hérétique était l'un des plus fidèles lieutenants de Kunrad Voigtvir et il m'a révélé, en hurlant de douleur, ce que je voulais savoir depuis si longtemps : le chemin menant à Salis Prime, le monde auquel aspire mon cœur ! Les hérétiques de l'Aube finale ont tout tenté pour nous arrêter, mais ils ont échoué. »
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: « Cet hérétique était l'un des plus fidèles lieutenants de Kunrad Voigtvir et il m'a révélé, en hurlant de douleur, ce que je voulais savoir depuis si longtemps : le chemin menant à Salis Prime, le monde auquel aspire mon cœur ! Les hérétiques de l'Aube finale ont tout tenté pour nous arrêter, mais ils ont échoué. »

languages.text: "Der Ketzer war einer von Kunrad Voigtvirs engsten Schergen. Und er hat preisgegeben, vor Schmerz schreiend, was ich so lange zu wissen begehrt habe: Die Wegmarkierungen nach Salis Prime, der Welt, nach der mein Herz sich sehnt! Die Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung haben alles getan, um uns aufzuhalten, doch sie sind gescheitert."
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ketzer war einer von Kunrad Voigtvirs engsten Schergen. Und er hat preisgegeben, vor Schmerz schreiend, was ich so lange zu wissen begehrt habe: Die Wegmarkierungen nach Salis Prime, der Welt, nach der mein Herz sich sehnt! Die Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung haben alles getan, um uns aufzuhalten, doch sie sind gescheitert."

languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

languages.text: "Kâfir, Kunrad Voigtvir'in en yakın yancılarından biriymiş. Acıdan kıvranırken uzun zamandır öğrenmeye çalıştığım bir şeyi... Kalbimin arzuladığı o dünyaya, Salis Prime'a giden rotayı açığa çıkardı! Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirleri bizi durdurmak için ellerinden geleni yaptılarsa da başaramadılar."
languages.original_text: "The heretic was one of Kunrad Voigtvir's closest henchmen. And he revealed — screaming through the pain — what I had wanted to know for so long: the markers of the route to Salis Prime, the world my heart calls to! The heretics of the Final Dawn tried all they could to stop us, but they failed."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfir, Kunrad Voigtvir'in en yakın yancılarından biriymiş. Acıdan kıvranırken uzun zamandır öğrenmeye çalıştığım bir şeyi açığa çıkardı: Kalbimin arzuladığı o dünyaya, Salis Prime'a giden rota! Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirleri bizi durdurmak için ellerinden geleni yaptılarsa da başaramadılar."
